text:
substance: Carbon
tetrachloride | type_of_trv: Oral TDI | trv_value: 7.1E-04
mg/kg -day
BW | study_details: Study Type: subchronic
Species: male Sprague-Dawley rats
Mode of Administration: gavage
(corn oil)
Exposure Regime: 0, 1, 10, or
33 mg/kg -day, administered as
BW
a single oral bolus, 5 days/week
Duration: 12 weeks
Uncertainty Factors: 1000 (10 for
intraspecies variability, 10 for interspecies
variability, and 10 for major database
deficiencies including lack of adequate
chronic studies and evidence regarding
carcinogenic mode of action in animals) | threshold_non_threshold_endpoint: NOAEL =
1 mg/kg -day
BW | trv_derivation_method: NOAEL adjusted
for weekly continuous
exposure
NOAEL =
adj
0.71 mg/kg -day
BW
TDI = NOAEL /UF
adj | critical_effect_s: Hepatotoxicity
(increased serum
sorbitol
dehydrogenase
levels and mild
centrilobular
vacuolization
in the liver) | carcinogenicity_classification: CEPA:
not assessed
IARC: Group 2B
possibly
carcinogenic
to humans
(IARC, 1999a)
US EPA IRIS:
likely to be
carcinogenic
to humans
(US EPA, 2010) | source: HC, 2010
(based on
Bruckner et al.,
1986)

substance: Carbon
tetrachloride | type_of_trv: Inhalation UR | trv_value: 6.0E-03
(mg/m³)–¹
[US EPA
(2010): do
not use with
exposures
>18 mg/m3] | study_details: Study Type: chronic
Species: male BDF1 mice
Mode of Administration: inhalation
Dosing Regime: 0, 5, 25, or 125 ppm
carbon tetrachloride vapour (0, 31, 157,
or 786 mg/m3), 6 hours/day, 5 days/week
Duration: 104 weeks
Uncertainty Factors: N/A | threshold_non_threshold_endpoint: LEC = 18 mg/m3
10
(lowest effective
concentration) | trv_derivation_method: Internal mouse doses
determined using PBPK
model
+
BMD modelling using a
log-probit model and an
extra 10% cancer risk
+
Linear extrapolation from
the POD (LEC ) converted
10
to a human equivalent
concentration using a
human PBPK model
Inhalation UR =
0.1 / LEC
10
[UR rounded to
6.0E-03 (mg/m3)-1] | critical_effect_s: Cancer
(adrenal gland
[pheochromo-
cytomas]) | source: HC, 2018a
(based on US EPA,
2010 [derived
from Nagano
et al., 2007 and
JBRC, 1998])
